What are API providers doing?

Essential Building Blocks

  • Portals
  • Getting Started
  • Authentication
  • Documentation
  • Sign Up / Login
  • SDKs / Snippets
  • Definitions (OpenAPI or Collection)
  • Support & Feedback
  • Pricing & Plans
  • Communications
  • Terms and Conditions
  • Status Dashboard

Type of APIs

  • Internal
  • Partner
  • Device
  • Infrastructure
  • Network

  • Application Programming Interface
  • Command Line Interfaces
  • Clients (ie. Postman *wink* *wink*)

How is developer behavior evolving?

API Consumer Reality

  • More 3rd Party APIs
  • More Partner APIs
  • More Internal APIs
  • More Complexity
  • More Interactions
  • More Chaos

API Consumer Interfaces

  • Client (HTTP, HTTP/2, HTTP/3, TCP)
  • Integrated Development Environment (IDE)
  • Application Programming Interface (API)
  • Command Line Interfaces (CLI)
  • Clients (ie. Postman *wink* *wink*)

API Consumer Engagement

  • Identity
  • Authentication
  • Collections
  • Environments
  • Modularity
  • Reuse
  • Sharing
  • Training

API Provider Process

  • Private APIs
  • Contract-Driven
  • Policy-Driven
  • API-First
  • Modularity
  • Reusability

  • Define
  • Mock
  • Documentation
  • Testing
  • Pipelines
  • SDKs / Scripts
  • Monitoring
  • Contract
